title: International visitor spending in Paris 2010 to 2018
yAxis: International visitor spending in billion U.S. dollars
summary: Overall International visitor spending in billion U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.
International visitor spending in billion U.S. dollars is slightly increasing from 2016 to 2017.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2016 and 2017.
Maximum International visitor spending in billion U.S. dollars, about 13.05 was reported at Year 2017
Minimum International visitor spending in billion U.S. dollars about 12.03 was reached at Year 2016
